description: Removes the specified targets from the specified rule.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Manipulating EventBridge rules by removing targets can alter the capabilities and behaviors of accounts without directly deleting them.
Removing security monitoring targets from EventBridge rules can impair defenses by preventing certain security actions from being triggered.

securityImplications: Attackers might use RemoveTargets in AWS EventBridge to eliminate crucial targets from event rules, effectively disabling intended actions or notifications triggered by specific events.
